title: What are some good songs to listen to while you're feeling depressed? - Quora

Note: I’ve very much a lyric person over music when it comes to songs I listen to when I feel depressed. Some of these songs may sound upbeat or happy when in reality they’re not. Also this whole list is a mess with me going back and forth between my Spotify and here sorry lol Pop/Alternative: Drugs - Eden 26 - Paramore Tell Me How - Paramore Ain’t It Fun - Paramore The A Team - Ed Sheran Supermarket Flowers - Ed Sheran Lovely (with Khalid) - Billie Eilish Idontwannabeyouanymore - Billie Eilish Inside Out - The Chainsmokers Chasing Cars - Snow Patrol Iris - The Goo Goo Dolls How to Save a Life - The Fray Over My Head (Cable Car) - The Fray Wild - Troye Sivan (this song and the next three must be listened in order. Even better if it’s while watching the Blue Neighbourhood trilogy video on YouTube) Fools - Troye Sivan Talk Me Down - Troye Sivan Summertime Sadness - Lana Del Ray Drown - Bring Me The Horizon Avalanche - Bring Me The Horizon (Honestly I should just put the whole album That’s The Spirit by Bring Me The Horizon down) Dying in LA - Panic! At The Disco The End Of All Things - Panic! At The Disco 24 Floors - The Maine (Un)lost - The Maine Lost In Nostalgia - The Maine Long Night - With Confidence Liquid Confidence (Nothing to Lose) - You Me At Six A Thousand Years - Christina Perri Say You Won’t Let Go - James Arthur Daddy Issues - The Neighbourhood Let It Go - James Bay Daisy - Zedd ( No idea why I listen to this so much when i’m down tbh) Cheyenne - Greyson Chance Unfriend You - Greyson Chance Waiting Outside The Lines - Greyson Chance Daylily - Movements Rock/All the other alt Rock subgenres that i’m not going to list here: The Bird and The Worm - The Used The Haunting - Set It Off Wolf In Sheeps Clothing - Set It Off (Get ready for a pre 2014 heavy bmth spam) Shadow Moses- Bring Me The Horizon Crucify Me - Bring Me The Horizon It Never Ends - Bring Me The Horizon Fuck - Bring Me The Horizon Alligator Blood - Bring Me The Horizon Russian Roulette- Bring Me The Horizon Chelsea Smile - Bring Me The Horizon (End of spam) 40 days… - blessthefall Bulls In The Bronx - Pierce The Veil Calm Snow - I See Stars New Demons - I See Stars Sarcasm - Get Scared White Lies - Dreamstate (Probably going to slap myself later because I can’t think of anymore lmao) Punk/pop punk: I miss you - Blink-182 Boulevard of Broken Dreams - Green Day Wake Me Up When September Ends - Greenday Dial Tones - As It Is Conventionally Friend - Cartel Gone - Knuckle Puck Loverboy - You Me At Six Bite My Tongue - You Me At Six Keys - With Confidence Be My Escape - Relient K Nerve - The Story So Far Out Of It - The Story So Far Playing Fiction - ROAM Always Crashing the Same Car - Sleep On It I’ll edit this adding more songs when it’s not 4 am but I hope this gives you a good idea
